/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of predominantly yellow, red, and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, punctuated by power lines that crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape.
